item.title: Bidding on Government of Canada contracts (Webinar)
item.description: Would you like to learn more about how to bid? item.title: Website service advisory: 2023-07-31
item.description: July 31, 2023- Ottawa- Maintenance to the Buyandsell.gc.ca website will begin at 20:00 ET Monday, July 31, 2023. During this maintenance window, there may be interruptions to the Buyandsell.gc.ca website. The site will be fully operational at 7:00 ET Tuesday, August 1, 2023.

item.title: Share your views on procurement pricing
